function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 through international travel","Impact":"Loss of international tourism receipts and a decline in tourist arrivals","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict travel restrictions and border closures, vaccination requirements for travelers","Technologies":"Digital health passports for verification of vaccination status, contact tracing apps","People":"International travelers, tourism industry workers","Owner":"Government authorities, tourism industry associations"},{"Description":"Economic impact on countries reliant on tourism","Impact":"Risk of economic downturn due to reduced tourism revenue and job losses","Mitigation":"Diversification of the economy, investment in other sectors, financial support for affected businesses and workers","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, financial aid and stimulus packages","People":"Countries reliant on tourism, workers in the tourism sector","Owner":"Government authorities, international organizations, local businesses"},{"Description":"Threat to sustainable development goals","Impact":"Reduction in tourism's contribution to global GDP and potential setback to sustainable development goals","Mitigation":"Investment in sustainable tourism practices, promotion of domestic tourism, collaboration with international organizations","Technologies":"Sustainable tourism technologies, digital marketing and booking platforms","People":"Communities reliant on sustainable tourism, international organizations","Owner":"Sustainable tourism organizations, government authorities"}]}
